title: Scientists just found a mind-boggling object in deep space
content: Researchers using NASA's NICER X-ray telescope discovered a neutron star spinning 716 times per second, making it one of the fastest-spinning known objects in the universe.
summary: Researchers using NASA's NICER X-ray telescope discovered a neutron star spinning 716 times per second, making it one of the fastest-spinning known objects in the universe.
